pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimization-Based Stable Balancing Weights // Use optimization to estimate weights that balance covariates for binary, multi- category, continuous, and multivariate treatments in the spirit of Zubizarreta (2015) doi:10.1080/01621459.2015.1023805. The degree of balance can be specified for each covariate. In addition, sampling weights can be estimated that allow a sample to generalize to a population specified with given target moments of covariates.
